p: All analyses were performed using R software (version 3.6.0) with the “mgcv” package (version 1.8–28). The results were expressed as percentage changes and 95% confidence intervals ( CIs) in daily new cases and daily new deaths of COVID-19 associated with a 1 unit increase in weather variables. All tests were two-sided, and a value P < 0.05 was considered statistically significant.
